## Getting Started with R

Let's start by doing some basic math in R.

```{r}
# Basic arithmetic
1 + 1
2 * 5
sqrt(16)
```

## Working with Vectors

```{r}
# Create a vector and calculate the mean
x <- c(10, 20, 30, 40, 50)
mean(x)
```
